description: Alain Cocq wanted to start Facebook livestreaming his final days on Saturday morning.
title: Alain Cocq: Facebook blocks incurably ill man from livestreaming death
title_page: Alain Cocq: Facebook blocks incurably ill man from livestreaming death - BBC News
maintext: "The road to deliverance begins and believe me, I am happy," Mr Cocq posted on Facebook early on Saturday morning from his bed at home in Dijon, after announcing he had "finished his last meal".
